#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
 
const int N = 20000010;
char s[N],str[N];
char ss[N];
 
int main()
{
    int c[3355];
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t --) {
        scanf("%s",ss);
        memset(c,0,sizeof(c));
        int c1 = 0,c2 = 0;
        for(int i = 0; ss[i]; i ++) {
            c[ss[i]] ++;
            if(c[ss[i]] & 1) s[c1 ++] = ss[i];
            else str[c2 ++] = ss[i];
        }
        s[c1] = str[c2] = 0;
        if(c1 != c2 || strcmp(s,str)) cout << "Twins don't exist" << endl;
        else printf("%s\n",s);
    }
    return 0;
}
